Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Yank Thread
Actions.Description: The Spinhob shoves a marked character in range 5 3 spaces in any direction. Foes can save to avoid this effect.

Actions.Name: Interweave Essence
Actions.Description: The Spinhob marks any two non-summon characters in range 2 of each other. The two are joined by an aethereal thread. While within range 2 of each other, they have resistance. The thread breaks if either of them are bloodied, and cannot be used on a bloodied character.
